sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR07
EAISEVRINSTNCNAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiSevrInstncName#||'%')
EAISVCNAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiSvcName#||'%')

SELECT ROWNO, B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, A.* FROM ( SELECT EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, EAISVCNAME , EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME, DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME, PSVSYSADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME, ADPTRBZWKNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR07
EAISEVRINSTNCNAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiSevrInstncName#||'%')
EAISVCNAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiSvcName#||'%')
) A ) B WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
